Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4.RUpizza

Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.RUpizza.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildYourOwnPizza, SpecialityPizza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
Abstract class representing a pizza in the pizza ordering system. It provides common properties and methods for different types of pizzas.

      public Pizza()

    • Pizza

      public Pizza(ArrayList<String> toppings, Size size, Sauce sauce, boolean extraSauce, boolean extraCheese)
      Constructor for creating a pizza with specified toppings, size, sauce, and additional options.
      Parameters:
      toppings - The toppings to add to the pizza.
      size - The size of the pizza.
      sauce - The sauce type for the pizza.
      extraSauce - Indicates whether extra sauce should be added to the pizza.
      extraCheese - Indicates whether extra cheese should be added to the pizza.

  • Method Details

    • setOrderID

      public abstract void setOrderID(int orderID)
      Abstract method to set the order ID for a pizza.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The order ID to set for the pizza.

    • createPizza

      public static Pizza createPizza(Pizza.PizzaType pizzaType, Size size, boolean extraSauce, boolean extraCheese)
      Factory method to create a pizza based on the specified pizza type, size, and additional options.
      Parameters:
      pizzaType - The type of the pizza to create.
      size - The size of the pizza to create.
      extraSauce - Indicates whether extra sauce should be added to the pizza.
      extraCheese - Indicates whether extra cheese should be added to the pizza.
      Returns:
      A new pizza instance based on the provided parameters.

    • calculatePrice

      public abstract double calculatePrice()
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses for calculating the price of the pizza.
      Returns:
      The calculated price of the pizza.
